javadoc:
An interface that enables callback when a {@link ComponentProvider} becomes activated or
 deactivated.

methods.javadoc:
Called when the given component provider is activated.
@param componentProvider The activated component provider.
methods.name: componentProviderActivated
methods.comment: Called when the given component provider is activated.

methods.javadoc:
Called when the given component provider is deactivated.
@param componentProvider The deactivated component provider.
methods.name: componentProviderDeactivated
methods.comment: Called when the given component provider is deactivated.

name: ComponentProviderActivationListener
comment:
An interface that enables callback when a ComponentProvider becomes activated or
 deactivated.
